dimensions.name: call_resolution
dimensions.description: Clearly captures what the customer wanted and whether it was resolved. Includes specific resolution details, any follow-up needed, and customer satisfaction indicators.

dimensions.name: action_items
dimensions.description: Lists all concrete next steps with clear ownership, deadlines, and success criteria. Must be actionable by the next agent or customer.

dimensions.name: context_preservation
dimensions.description: Captures key business context: customer history, account details, previous issues, escalation reasons, and any special circumstances that affect service delivery.

dimensions.name: compliance_notes
dimensions.description: Documents any compliance issues, regulatory requirements, data privacy concerns, or policy violations that need attention or follow-up.

dimensions.name: quality_indicators
dimensions.description: Captures service quality metrics: call duration, customer sentiment, agent performance notes, and any process improvements identified.

gates.description: Business-grade quality bar: summaries must be immediately useful for call center operations and customer service continuity
